review.title: “Fun”
review.pros: Pros – Fun, up and coming company with a lot of passionate projects
review.cons: Cons – far from where I lived.

review.title: “It was a miserable, soul sucking experience”
review.pros: Pros – Co-workers were nice and competent.
review.cons: Cons – Lack of direction, poor management.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Hire better management.
